(Robber Baron): (boot)Lose less of your inventory on death. (commoncard)
(Dragon's Song): (icon)Landing a basic attack within 5 seconds of using a mantra will refund half of the ether cost. (commoncard)
(Gourmand): (icon)Gain more food and saturation from eating food. (commoncard)
(Conditioned Swimmer): (icon)Swim faster in water, and move slightly faster in the depths. (commoncard)
(Agility Uncapped): (boot)You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest. (commoncard)
(Fortitude Uncapped): (ribs)You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest. (commoncard)
(Strength Uncapped): (hand)You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Strength to its fullest. (commoncard)
(Mind Uncapped): (mind)You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Mind to its fullest. (commoncard)
(Carnivore): (jaw)In return for losing the ability to eat vegetation, satiate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike.(rarecard)
(Flame Within): (flame)When on fire, gain 15% movement speed and 15% extra attack damage.(commoncard)
(Berserk): (eye)Allows you to go berserk, nullifying both your own and your target's armor for a short duration. [BOOST KEY] (commoncard)
(Knuckle Guard): (hand)Hitting enemies grants posture resistance, each stack increasing it by 10%, up to 30%. (commoncard)
(Champion's Regalia): (hand)Hitting enemies grants a boost to your posture damage, each stack increasing it by 10%, up to 50%.(commoncard)
(Heavy Hitter): (hand)When using large weapons, deal 15% more posture damage. (commoncard)
(Unstoppable Force): (sword)When using large weapons, gain a speed and posture buff when your block is hit. (commoncard)
(Destructive Recovery): (sword)When using large weapons, every parry has a chance to guardbreak an opponents posture depending on how close they are to being guardbroken. (commoncard)
(Concussion): (icon)Enemies at low health will be slowed and given weakness when attacked. (commoncard)
(Precise Swing): (eye)Attacks dealt shortly after landing a weapon's special attack will ignore armor. (commoncard)
(Strong Hold): (hand)While above 50% of your health, recieve 20% less posture damage. (commoncard)
(Charged Return): (eye)When under elemental status effects, deal 10% more damage. (commoncard)
(Nullifying Clarity): (sword)Deal 10% more damage to enemies with positive status effects. (commoncard)
(Unwavering Focus): (eyes)When your mantras are parried, take less posture. (commoncard)
(Leg Shot): (boot) While wielding a rifle, landing your critical slows your enemy for a bit, and also inverts any speed boosts they get for the next 10 seconds. (rarecard)
(Tactical Reload): (mind)Activate to make your rifle shoot ranged bullets for 15 seconds. [BOOST KEY] (rarecard)
(Lose Your Mind): (eye)Deal more damage the more insane you are, granting +40% damage at maximum insanity. (commoncard)
(Murmur: Ardour): (sword)An application of your Soul Murmur that enables one to channel the murmur into raw strength, signifigantly boosting your posture damage. (commoncard)
(Ardour Scream): (jaw)Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, those who hear it will take 15% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s. (commoncard)
(Broken Ankles): (boot)Guardbreaking an opponent prevents them from moving for 6 seconds. (commoncard)
(Piercing Blow): (hand)Attacks that break an opponent's block ignore their Armor resistances. (rarecard)
(Million Ton Piercer): (hand)Ignore 50% of your opponent's armor on your basic attacks. (rarecard)
(Bear Trap): (claw)Landing your weapon's critical attack will heavily slow your foes. (commoncard)
(Blade Dancer): (sword)Landing a Basic Attack removes your roll cooldown. (commoncard)
(Showstopper): (boot)Trip enemies who go airborne, knocking them down for a short duration. (rarecard)
(Curb Stomper): (boot)Enemies who have been knocked down now take triple damage, however they now will get up immidiately after being hit. (rarecard)
(Brassneck): (ribs)Applying knockdown to an enemy grants you 20% damage resistance. (commoncard)
(Full Reset): (icon)Killing an enemy now resets your resonance cooldown. (rarecard)
(Potion Quaffer): (potion)You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly, drinking potions slows less and grants superior effects to you. (commoncard)
(Endurance Runner): (boot)Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving. (commoncard)
(Scaredy Cat): (boot)When enemies initiate a fight first, gain a speed boost. (commoncard)
(Conditioned Runner): (boot)You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP. The health amount scales with your agility stat. (rarecard)
(Battle Tendency): (hand)You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen. (commoncard)
(Braced Collapse): (ribs)After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage. (commoncard)
(Moving Fortress): (ribs)Blocking no longer slows you down as much. (commoncard)
(Down to your Level): (boot)Enemies you hit will move no faster than you can. (commoncard)
(Exoskeleton): (ribs)You have a layer of fortified Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest. Your Natural Armor will resist 10% Physical Damage when active. (rarecard)
(To the Finish): (ribs)You take 25% less damage when below 50% health. (rarecard)
(Brick Wall): (handcut)You refuse. You can no longer be knocked down or moved by attacks. (rarecard)
(Mythic Stability): (icon)In a case where you would normally die, you will survive, immune to damage for 7 seconds. 90 second cooldown. (rarecard)
(Dramatic Effect): (mind)Every time you take damage, have a chance to yell out in agony, reducing incoming damage by 10% for 5 seconds. (rarecard)
(Hoplite): (icon)When using spears, posture damage will be reduced by 20% if you are standing still. (commoncard)
(Knight's Rally): (icon)When using a shield, if you would be guardbroken, let out a defiant shout and push everything away. (commoncard)
(Unfazed): (icon)You are more resilient to the side effects of going insane. You no longer Shiver and you Panic with less severity. (commoncard)
(Ready or Not): (icon) The first attack to hit you while out of combat has its damage cut in half. (commoncard)
(Time To Go): (icon)Taking a life grants a speed boost for 10 seconds. Taking a player's life doubles the speed boost and the duration. (commoncard)
(Grand Feast): (icon)Regain ether and extra health when gaining hunger from killing. (commoncard)
(Sunken Predator): (icon)Enemies you hit in the water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed. (commoncard)
(Dodge): (icon)Instead of parrying, you now do a short dash in the direction you are moving. When your block is hit, do a shorter dash backwards. (commoncard)
(Butterfly): (icon) Successful parries or dodges increase your speed. (commoncard)
(Lowstride): (icon)Crouching increases the distance of your dodge and no longer slows as much. (commoncard)
(Evasive Expert): (icon)Your speed boost granted from dodging is increased. (rarecard)
(Risky Moves): (icon)When you successfully dodge, you'll automatically dodge the first attack within 10 seconds. (rarecard)
(Ghost): (icon)Dodging a move will briefly make you invisible, ending early if you attack.  (rarecard)
(Behind You): (icon)Landing a basic attack behind your enemy after using a mantra will apply an ether slash, dealing extra damage based on how much ether you have left(does not consume ether). (commoncard)
(Observation): (icon)Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately(double tap dodge key). (rarecard)
(Safety Dance): (icon)Your base dodge frames are increased by 0.2s. (rarecard)
(Lightspeed Reflexes): (icon) Feinting gives a brief auto-parry window. (rarecard)
(Cheap Shot): (icon)Your attacks gain 10% PEN multiplicatively when you have an active speed boost. (rarecard)
(Crippling Comeuppance): (icon)Revenge now deals additional damage based on the distance between you and your opponent, and now applies slow and weakness. (commoncard)
(Down Comes the Claw): (icon)Landing a weapon special attack now disables your opponent's posture regeneration for 5 seconds. (commoncard)
(Maiming Claws): (icon)Down Comes the Claw now inverts your opponent's posture regeneration for 10 seconds. (commoncard)
(Pursuit): (icon)If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately. (commoncard)
(Action Surge): (icon)Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.2 for its duration. (commoncard)
(Speed Demon): (icon)Your attacks now inflict a reduced-strength bleed while you have a speed boost. (rarecard)
(Spinning Swordsman): (sword)Attacks do +10% extra damage when you have a speed boost. (commoncard)
(Everchanging Aegis): (icon)You take 20% less damage from the last damage type you were hit by, however you will take 10% more damage from different attack types. (rarecard)
(Neural Overload): (icon)You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3. (rarecard)
(Overflowing Dam): (icon)Having full Ether grants an aura to your attacks that grant them 10% more damage. (rarecard)
(Perfect Flash): (icon)Having over 95% health causes your mantras to do +25% damage. (rarecard)
(Apothecary): (icon)Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed, and amplified negative effects when thrown. (commoncard)
(Chain Reaction): (icon)When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified. You have a 25% chance not to deplete potions when drinking them. (commoncard)
(Chemist's Bag): (icon)You no longer drop Potions on death. (commoncard)
(Wild Alchemy): (icon) You have a chance to brew 2 potions instead of 1. (commoncard)
(Approaching Singularity): (icon)You now gain 3% mantra pen for every 5 points in your intelligence stat. (commoncard)
(Ether Absorption): (icon)Receive Ether back when inflicted with damage from non-generic attacks. (commoncard)
(Eureka): (icon)Gain a stack of Inspiration every time you land or parry a Mantra. Whiffing a Mantra removes a stack of Inspiration. Reaching 3 stacks grants +10% Mantra Damage to your next Mantra attack. (rarecard)
(Mantra Permanence): (icon)Killing an enemy with a mantra refunds its ether cost and puts it off cooldown. (commoncard)
(Neuroplasticity): (icon)Your intelligence is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantras is now reduced by 20%. (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot) (rarecard)
(Ether Bullets): (icon)Your rifle's basic shot attacks now have much greater range, at the cost of your ether. (commoncard)
(True Ether Bullets): (icon)Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage and the elemental status of your highest investment. (rarecard)
(Prime Ether Bullets): (icon)Your bullets take one less hit to proc elemental effects and now have slight intelligence scaling. (rarecard)
(All the Dead Gods): (icon)Your Basic Attacks now apply anti-heal for 8s. Anti-heal affects both health and posture. (commoncard)
(All Above, Gods Below): (icon)Any health or posture your opponent were to receive while All The Dead Gods is active on them is stolen and given to you. (commoncard)
(Critical Engine): (icon)You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your weapon's special attack, activating the gem on the last mantra you hit.(commoncard)
(All Knowing): (icon)Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks. (rarecard)
(Successive Prediction): (icon)Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another. (commoncard)
(Twelve Steps Ahead): (icon)Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s. Whiffing will double the cooldown to a maximum of 30s.  (commoncard)
(Ether Overdrive): (icon)Ignore 50% of your opponent's armor on your mantra attacks. (rarecard)
(Bloodiron Spirit): (icon)Gain some temporary armor when you kill an enemy. (rarecard)
(Artisan Chef): (icon)The food you make now becomes Artisan food, increasing its hunger and saturation gained by +25%.(commoncard)
(Master Chef): (icon)Foods you make now apply a random positive effect when eaten. (commoncard)
(Hell's Kitchen): (icon)Foods you make now provide 25% more hunger and saturation, and provide another 25% if made in the depths. (commoncard)
(Against All Odds): (icon)For each combat tag you have on your character, increase your damage by 5%.(commoncard)
(Defiance): (icon)The amplifiers of negative status effects are reduced by 2 when under half of your maximum health. (commoncard)
(Underdog): (icon)Deal 5% more damage to those who have more health than you. (commoncard)
(Heretic's Sutra): (icon)A chant that steers you into the state of Insanity for 20 seconds. [BOOST] (commoncard)
(Sin Stacker): (icon)The duration of All the Dead Gods duration is increased by 30% for every stack of All the Dead Gods currently active on your target. (rarecard)
(Peripheral Vision): (icon)Your Glare no longer requires your opponent to be looking at you, just that they are within range. (commoncard)
(Comeback Kid): (icon)Regaining health when under 25% hp prevents you from being killed for 10 seconds. 60s cooldown. (commoncard)
(Last Resort): (icon)Deal +15% more damage when your health is below 25%. (commoncard)
(The Eleventh Hour): (icon)When below 20% health your mantras require no ether to cast for 15 seconds. 60s cooldown (commoncard)
(Old Habits Die Hard): (icon)Blocking an attack after failing a parry will cause the attack to deal 15% less posture damage. (commoncard)
(Thresher Claws): (icon)All of your attacks have +5% more PEN. Your Basic Attacks and weapon specials have an additional +5% PEN on top. (rarecard)
(Breathing Exercise): (icon)Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations. (commoncard)
(Conquer your Fears): (icon)Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your sanity somewhat. (commoncard)
(Nightmare on Elm Street): (icon)Hitting enemies currently affected by knockdown drains their sanity. (rarecard)
(Echoing Lunatic): (icon)Your Ardour Scream now applies a bit of insanity. (commoncard)
(Piercing Will): (icon)When your sanity is below 35%, gain up to +15% PEN on your attacks. Starting at 5% PEN, the lower your sanity, the higher your PEN. (rarecard)
(Shared Misery): (icon)Basic attacks will reduce your opponent's sanity by 3%. Weapon specials will reduce their sanity by half of what you have currently lost. (commoncard)
(Magical Resolve): (icon)Being hit increases Ether regen for a short duration (commoncard)
(Meteor Impact): (icon)Aerial moves will follow up into a devastating slam. (commoncard)
(Pheonix Impact): (icon) If you Meteor Slam an opponent whilst on fire, restore some HP and Ether. (commoncard)
(Dancing Steps): (icon)Fire mantras now move you in the direction you're facing. (commoncard)
(Graceful Steps): (icon)Your dancing steps now gives a faster speed boost. (rarecard)
(The Final Act): (icon)Landing a fire mantra after hitting an opponent with three basic attacks will cause them to explode. (rarecard)
(Hell's Partisan): (icon)After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above. (commoncard)
(Warding Radiance): (icon)Every fire mantra builds up one halo stack. At 3 stacks a halo appears that allows you to slide further. (rarecard)
(Pleeksty's Wrath): (icon)After dealing 500 damage with Flame Mantras, call forth a hail of firey swords. (rarecard)
(Overheat Path: Flameburster): (icon)Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead build up your heat meter. Press B to unleash your built-up heat, massively boosting the damage and power of your flames. (commoncard)
(Divine Flame): (icon)Unleash a devastating arrow of flame, using all of your currently built-up heat. 180s cooldown, hold B to use. (commoncard)
(Open the Kiln): (icon)During your heat release, anyone who gets too close will take small fire damage and be pushed away. (commoncard)
(Eruption Path: Lava Serpent): (icon)Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc an eruption under the enemies feet. (commoncard)
(Unyielding Inferno): (icon)Your flamecharm no longer dwindles in rainy weather or in the depths. (commoncard)
(Agitating Spark): (icon)If you hit an opponent that you've lit on fire, it spreads to anyone nearby. Including yourself. (commoncard)
(Immolation): (icon)Fire spells cost 70% less while on fire. If you hit someone while on fire, apply fire damage. You take 50% less damage from being set on fire. (commoncard)
(Phoenix Flames): (icon)Any time you would burn to death, you instead rise again with 50% of your health restored. Has a 60 second cooldown. (rarecard)
(Corpse Explosion): (icon)Anyone who burns to death at the cause of your flame will explode. (commoncard)
(Pleeksty's Faith): (icon)When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some ether. (commoncard)
(Empowered Eruption): (icon)Your next Eruption after landing a weapon special is Empowered with +50% range and damage. 10s cooldown. (commoncard)
(The Floor is Lava): (icon)Your Eruptions leave lethal pools of lava beneath them. Don't fall in. (rarecard)
(Hungry Flames): (icon) When you have no Ether, consume hunger and saturation to instantly cast your next fire mantra. (commoncard)
(Explosive Finish): (icon)If a flaming enemy is hit 3 times, blast them away with a fire blast. (commoncard)
(Emperor Flame): (icon)Applying flames to opponents builds up Emperor Flame stacks. This flourish will deal additional damage and proc Decay, reducing your opponent's maximum health temporarily. (commoncard)
(Mirage Clone): (icon)Successfully dodging leaves behind a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire. (rarecard)
(Denial Repulse): (icon)You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death. (rarecard)
(Undying Flame): (icon)Your Graceful Flame burns brightly even underwater. Those that gather around it are soothed and regain sanity. (commoncard)
(Ash Ember): (icon)The more Decay your opponent has, the more damage your burn deals. (commoncard)
(Scorching Decay): (icon)The Decay dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased. (commoncard)
(Flaming Flourish): (icon)Hitting an enemy 3 times with basic attacks will set them on fire. (commoncard)
